description:
Shiori is pissed aftrer Miki followed Yoshihiro home, and that Miki thinks Yoshihiro is her boyfriend, that Shiori is just his past lover. Yui knowing Mikis strange self-image, is more ok with Mikis behaviour. Yoshihiro has his own way of showing Shiori his feelings.
Source: TMDB

titles.title: Pretentious Girl on the Verge of Tears Shiori: Punishment Jealousy Cheeky Missed Opportunity
泣きべそ蓮っ葉・栞~お仕置きじぇらしぃナマ逸機♥~
